channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Litter on slip road coming off J10 M5, 2nd October
item.description:
Large amounts of litter on the slip road between the J10 M5 and A4019. This was reported in March and I believe this issue has been 'closed' but the litter has not been dealt with in the past 7 months.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Disabled parking bay needs remarking as paint is so faded., 2nd October
item.description:
On the road outside the flats on cowper road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 5, Cowper Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues

item.title: Tree limbs overhanging road and property. Regularly damaged by high sided vehicles and refuse lorry. Branches fall onto roof of my summerhouse, 2nd October
item.description:
Tree located on verge/land between Haymes Drive and B4632. My property is Woodstock. What 3 Words reference is ///fires.recorder.sideboard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Haymes Drive, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 2nd October
item.description:
The trees are overflowing the carriageway and they are hitting van roofs and scratching cars, also the streetlights are being engulfed by them.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Trees from Appleton Way to 59 Green Lane, 2nd October
item.description:
Over hanging branches and hidden street light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cars grounding out over a 50-60 Yards section, 2nd October
item.description:
At the steepest section, in the 'S' bend but also before and after the bend, cars are grounding out in multiple locations, as the road surface had collapsed, subsided, and potholes gave been badly repaired. This is dangerous! Potentially damaging brakes, suspension and dumps.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bushcombe Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Unpermitted roadworks problem, 2nd October
item.description:
Customer reports that STW appear to have completed work on the site and departed, but the temporary TS remains in position and is still actively controlling the traffic. Please can this be removed asap as this is a main route through Cheltenham and it is impacting on traffic.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Condition of the road after recent repair work., 2nd October
item.description:
